quizDescription.text: Answer the following questions.Write the correct option in the textbox.

questionText.text:
R^2 value is between 0 and 1 and R^2= 0 means a perfect predictive model and R2=1 means no improvement over baseline
1. True
2. False

R^2 is unitless and universally interpretable
a. True
b. False

Best model coefficients selected to minimize SSE for a linear regression model.
a. True
b. False

Linear regression would predict a continuous outcome whereas Logistic regression would predict a discrete (categorical) outcome.
a. True
b. False

If area under ROC curve is 1 then it would be a perfect prediction
a. True
b. False
Match the following for classification algorithms: 2 marks
